name: Defilement
description:
Free the graveyard from corruption.

This is a God of War fan level made by me. All assets and scripting were done by me as a level design exercise. Keyboard controls only (controls are listed in the game).

Note: Making combat like God of War would require a ton of extra programming time that I would rather spend on another project. That said, the combat in this demo is very very minimal. I'm happy to take any level-design-specific feedback. 

If you'd like to see my process for making this project, you can see it on my website: 
https://tylermccombs.com/

Press P at any time to restart. Esc to quit.
